product_name: Pearl Izumi Sun Sleeve Arm Warmers
long_description: These Sun Sleeves from Pearl Izumi provide lightweight, cool protection for your arms when biking or running in sunny weather. With a UPF 40+ rating on top, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretch nylon fabric blend moves moisture away from your arms for cool, dry comfort. Underarm mesh panels enhance air circulation. Easy on and off; sleeves feature an anatomic right- and left-arm-specific fit. Pearl Izumi recommends purchasing the same size arm warmer as your typical cycle jersey size. Sun Sleeves feature reflective elements to boost your visibility when riding in dim light.
short_description: These Sun Sleeves from Pearl Izumi provide lightweight, cool protection for your arms when biking or running in sunny weather.
